languages.text: "Я не буду просить тебя о снисхождении, седовласый — ведь я тоже не доверилась чужаку. Но элантах... оказал{mf|ся|ась} лучше нас обоих".
"I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."
languages.original_text: "Я не буду просить тебя о снисхождении, седовласый — ведь я тоже не доверилась чужаку. Но элантах... оказал{mf|ся|ась} лучше нас обоих".

traits.locale_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我不会请求你的谅解，灰发猴子，因为我也没有信任过你。可外界人……事实证明，外界人的内心比我们两个都要强大。”
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."

traits.locale_text: “我不会请求你的谅解，灰发猴子，因为我也没有信任过你。可外界人……事实证明，外界人的内心比我们两个都要强大。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne m'attends pas à ce que vous me compreniez, vieil homme, car je ne vous ai moi-même pas accordé ma confiance. Mais l'elantach... en a eu assez pour nous deux. »
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne m'attends pas à ce que vous me compreniez, vieil homme, car je ne vous ai moi-même pas accordé ma confiance. Mais l'elantach... en a eu assez pour nous deux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No pediré tu comprensión. anciano... yo tampoco confié. Pero {mf|el|la} elantach... ha demostrado ser mejor que los dos».
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."

traits.locale_text: «No pediré tu comprensión. anciano... yo tampoco confié. Pero {mf|el|la} elantach... ha demostrado ser mejor que los dos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「わかってもらうつもりはない、白髪の…私も、信頼していなからな。だが、エランタは…私たち両名より物をよくわかっている」
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."

traits.locale_text: 「わかってもらうつもりはない、白髪の…私も、信頼していなからな。だが、エランタは…私たち両名より物をよくわかっている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bitte Euch nicht um Euer Verständnis, Graukopf — denn auch ich habe mein Vertrauen zurückgehalten. Doch der Elantach ... ist besser als wir beide."
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte Euch nicht um Euer Verständnis, Graukopf — denn auch ich habe mein Vertrauen zurückgehalten. Doch der Elantach ... ist besser als wir beide."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."

languages.text: "Anlayışlı davranman için yalvarmayacağım ak saçlı çünkü ben de güvenmedim. Fakat elantach... İkimizden erdemli."
languages.original_text: "I will not ask for your understanding, grey-haired one — for I, too, withheld my trust. But the elantach... proved better than both of us."

traits.locale_text: "Anlayışlı davranman için yalvarmayacağım ak saçlı çünkü ben de güvenmedim. Fakat elantach... İkimizden de iyi çıktı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
